title: Pokemon Pyjamas Pikachu & Eevee Frill Sleeve Long OR Short Leg Girls PJs
features: POKEMON T-SHIRT WITH LONG OR SHORT PYJAMA BOTTOMS – Pokémon PJ set for girls includes a Pikachu & Eevee t-shirt paired perfectly with a choice of either long leg Pokémon pj bottoms or shorts making an awesome gift for little girl gamers.

AVAILABLE IN VARIETY OF SIZES POKEMON PJS – The children’s Pokémon short or long sleepwear set comes in sizes; 3-4, 5-6, 6-7, 7-8, 9-10 and 11-12 years. They come in a regular kid fit and are made for ultimate comfort and are a great idea as a Pokémon birthday present or for any special occasion!

COTTON TEE & SHORT OR LONG TROUSERS – The Pokémon nightwear set for her includes a short sleeve frilled white cotton t-shirt paired with pink and cotton Pokémon shorts or full-length trousers for a cosy, light, and very soft feel. The Pokémon pyjama bottoms feature a durable and elasticated waistband for the perfect fit!

POKEMON GLITTER & CHARACTER TEE WITH SHORT OR LONG BOTTOMS – The Pokémon tee for girls features fan favourite besties ‘Pikachu’ and ‘Eevee’ surrounded by hearts and a glitter text reading ‘BESTIES’. Paired perfectly with pink and white long or short pyjama bottoms featuring the bestie characters faces.

OFFICIALLY LICENSED POKEMON MERCHANDISE – This Pokémon t-shirt and long or short pyjama bottom set is 100% official Pokémon merchandise. To get the most out of this product please wash with similar colours, wash inside out, iron on the reverse side and do not iron on print.
description: A must have for little Pokémon trainers, these super cute white and pink Pokémon pyjamas for girls are available with short or long pyjama bottom options. Whether they love the Pokémon tv series, movies, toys or games; this is the perfect addition to your little one’s Pokémon merchandise collection. The Pokémon nightwear set for kids comes with a pink and stylish frilled sleeve Pokémon t-shirt paired perfectly with a choice of either long leg Pokémon pj bottoms or shorts; the sets are both awesome for lounging and Pokémon gaming. The super cute Pokémon t-shirt for girls features fan favourite characters 'Pikachu' and 'Eevee' in a cute besties design with silver glitter print detail. The Pokémon besties t-shirt has short frilled sleeves with a crew neck, on a white cotton base. The long and short Pokémon bottoms feature an adorable all over white and pink heart print finished with awesome Pikachu & Eevee character faces making an awesome Pokémon gift for girl gamers at Christmas, birthdays and all occasions. The Pokémon Pikachu & Eevee besties sleepwear set is made from 100% cotton and the pj bottoms features an elasticated waistband for the perfect fit and feel making it sure to provide your little ones with a sweet night sleep. This item is 100% genuine licensed Pokémon merchandise & features official branding throughout. We want you to get the most out of your new pyjamas, so please be sure to follow all care label instructions and contact our dedicated customer service team for any additional information or sizing queries.
